name: Lemon Zester Grater, Citrus Zester Grater with Handle, Kitchen Gadgets for Cheese, Lemon, Chocolate, Nutmeg, Ginger, Fruit, Vegetable, Stainless Steel Micro Cheese Grate, Dishwasher Safe(Narrow)
short_description: 【Careful Material Melection】304 thickened stainless steel material, which can directly contact with food, sharp knife edge, planed out fine wire, solid material, durable, easy to clean. 【Multiple Functions】 Applicable to cheese, lemon, chocolate, ginger, garlic, citrus fruits, etc., shaving, no need for knife cutting, saving cooking time and meeting various cooking needs. 【Humanistic Design】The foot pad is wrapped, which is not easy to slip, smooth and smooth, square knife hole, fine and sharp, evenly distributed knife hole, neat and thin wire. 【Comfortable Handle】The handle is made of rubber material, with flexible surface, frosted texture, non-slip grip.Ergonomically Designed handle, bring good comfort, with hanging hole for convenient storage. 【Safe and Easy to Use】It comes with anti-skid protective shell and small brush, the protective shell can cover the knife edge when not in use, prevent hand injury. Small brush is easy to wash grater, and make it safer and healthier to use.

name: Rainspire Upgraded Zester Grater with Cover Lemon Zester Cheese Grater for Kitchen Stainless Steel, Parmesan Cheese Garlic Nutmeg Chocolate Fruits Vegetables Ginger Grater, Kitchen Gifts, Fine, Black
short_description: Premium Classic Zester - It is perfect for zesting all citrus fruits and grating hard cheese, chocolate, ginger, garlic, nutmeg, truffle, spices, nuts & more. Dishwasher safe. Ultra Sharp Blade- Sharp, etched stainless steel grating surface for fast, easy zesting and grating. Safety Cover - Convenient cover keeps grating surface and hands protected when not in use. Non-slip Foot - A non-slip tip provides extra stability if using a cutting board or kitchen counter for support. Soft Touch Handle- An easy-grip handle makes grating directly over food convenient.

name: OXO Steel Grater
short_description: Sharp, etched stainless steel grating surface Efficiently grates cheese, vegetables, chocolate, and more Features a sleek handle that’s also comfortable to hold Comes with a cover for safe storage
product_description: The OXO Steel Grater will be your secret weapon when it comes to finishing a dish. It can grate fluffy clouds of parmesan onto big bowls of pasta, add lemon zest to a homemade salad dressing, add littles curls of chocolate to a freshly cooled cake, and more. The etched stainless steel teeth are super-sharp and can make quick work of any grating task. The tool also has a sleek handle that’s comfortable to hold and comes with a storage cover to protect the tiny blades (and your hands) when not in use.

name: Microplane Gourmet Dual Grater - Fine and Coarse Stainless Steel Blades for Effortless Parmesan Cheese Grating and More
short_description: ULTRA SHARP BLADES - Made in USA! Blades are made of US Stainless Steel, at our facility in Russellville Arkansas; *Support American jobs and manufacturing by purchasing this product. NON-SLIP -The base of the frame has a non-slip foot to keep the grater from slipping while you cook and preventing any scratching on your countertops. ERGONOMIC SOFT TOUCH HANDLE: The Microplane Gourmet Series family of graters features a soft grip ergonomic handle identical to our popular Premium Classic Series Zester. FINE BLADE BEST FOR: Hard Cheeses (Parmesan, Asiago, Manchego), Citrus, Chili, Ginger, Garlic, Results are powder like and blend without texture. COARSE BEST FOR - Carrots, Ginger, Nuts, Chocolate, Coconut, and Hard Cheeses. The results will be small gratings.
product_description: The Microplane Dual Blade Cheese Grater - the ultimate kitchen tool for all your grating needs! With two blades in one handheld grater, this versatile kitchen gadget can be used to grate both soft and hard cheeses, citrus, spices, and more - saving valuable drawer space while still providing all of the grating power you need. The fine blade is perfect for grating hard cheeses like Parmesan and Romano, as well as citrus fruits like lemons and limes for the perfect zest. The coarse blade, on the other hand, is great for grating softer cheeses like cheddar, as well as a variety of spices like nutmeg and cinnamon. The ergonomic handle makes it easy to grip and use, while the sharp stainless steel blades ensure that you can get the job done quickly and easily. Plus, with its compact size, you can easily store it in a drawer or hang it up for easy access. So if you're looking for the best Parmesan cheese grater, look no further than the Microplane Dual Blade Cheese Grater. It's the perfect tool for any home cook or professional chef looking to up their grating game!

name: Microplane Professional Series Kitchen Grater new Coarse for Cheese, Carrot, Ginger, Coconut, Nuts and Horseradish with Stainless Steel Blades - Made in USA
short_description: Redesigned for Enhanced Durability: The Microplane Professional Series Coarse Grater has undergone a significant redesign, emphasizing durability and resistance to breakage, ensuring it withstands the rigors of frequent use in both professional kitchens and home cooking environments. Premium USA-Made Grating Blade: Proudly featuring a grating blade that is crafted in the USA, this grater guarantees exceptional quality and sharpness, designed to effortlessly tackle a wide range of grating tasks with precision and ease. Superior Stainless Steel Construction: Boasting an all-stainless steel design, the grater is not only aesthetically pleasing but also highly durable and easy to clean, making post-meal cleanup a breeze. Optimal Coarse Grating: Perfectly engineered to produce coarse grates ideal for cheeses, vegetables, and other ingredients, this grater enhances the texture and flavor of your dishes, making it a valuable tool for any culinary creation. Ergonomic and Safe Design: Designed with the user's comfort and safety in mind, the grater features an ergonomically shaped handle and a non-slip base, providing stability and comfort during use, reducing the risk of injury.

name: Microplane Classic Zester Grater, Black
short_description: Ultra Sharp Made in USA blades: Microplane uses photo-etched technology to make ultra sharp grating blades right here in America! BPA free plastic handle. Zest Citrus: The blade is designed with a specific tooth set that takes the flavorful rind directly off the citrus fruit, while leaving behind the bitter white pith. Zest adds flavor to vinaigrettes, stir fries, salads, and baked goods! Grate Cheese: Grate parmesan into fluffy mounds that melt quickly and look beautiful when treating yourself of family to rustic bowls of pasta. Sprinkle fresh parmesan over eggs, salads, or any dish for a burst of flavor. Surgical Grade Stainless Steel: this material stays rust-free and maintains sharpness over time. True stainless steel is magnetic, so this item can be hung on your magnetic knife strip. Dishwasher Safe: The tool is easy to clean, simply rinse immediately after use. Use a kitchen brush on the underside of the blade to clean out tough to reach particles. The zester/grater can also be placed in the dishwasher.

This tool is normally used to grate citrus for perfect lemon, lime, and orange zests or to create pillowy mounds of Parmesan cheese. Microplane Premium Classic Zester Graters A versatile must-have tool for the kitchen! This tool is normally used to grate citrus for perfect lemon, lime, and orange zests or to create pillowy mounds of parmesan cheese. However, it is also a great tool for grating spices like nutmeg, cinnamon, and even chilies into fresh ground powders. If your dish requires fresh grated ginger or garlic, this tool will do that job as well. Customers have let us know that they even use this tool to remove burnt edges from cookies and bread. What will you use it for? What is the difference between Original Classic and Premium Classic? The Premium Classic Zester Grater by Microplane provides a soft touch handle, instead of hard plastic. In addition this line provides a choice of handle colors. You can expect the same grating or zesting experience with either tool. Why is Sharper Better? Food is grated or zested without ripping or tearing which improves the look of the final dish Food is grated or zested without bruising which improves flavor and aroma Less pressure is required while grating - making the task faster and more efficient What makes Microplane so sharp? Microplane Blade Enlarged 50x View larger Do Chef's use Microplane? The Microplane is the standard for sharp, efficient grating and zesting in both home and professional kitchens - just ask any chef if they use a Microplane! Dining out anywhere will usually lead to a Microplane sighting. Photo-etching and surgical grade stainless steel Microplane began using this signature technology in the 1990's. Most tools use stamped or cut metal. Photo-etching creates a much finer point, which means your Microplane digs in and performs better.
